subject: Soccer
Crime and Criminals
World Cup 2010 (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: A French judge issued preliminary charges against Franck Ribéry and Karim Benzema, star players for France’s World Cup team, for soliciting an under-age prostitute.
snippet: A French judge issued preliminary charges against Franck Ribéry and Karim Benzema, star players for France’s World Cup team, for soliciting an under-age prostitute.
